content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-market-tote-bag-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level intermediate this pattern uses the chain double_crochet linked double_crochet decrease slip_stitch dc3tog materials needed size 4 yarn 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2022 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
